mapper.select: SELECT DbT7063."yukoKaishiYMD" as "DbT7063_yukoKaishiYMD", DbT7063."yukoShuryoYMD" as "DbT7063_yukoShuryoYMD", DbT7063."jigyoshaName" as "DbT7063_jigyoshaName", DbT7063."kanrishaName" as "DbT7063_kanrishaName", DbT7063."serviceShuruiCode" as "DbT7063_serviceShuruiCode" FROM rgdb."DbT7063KaigoJigyoshaShiteiService" AS DbT7063 WHERE DbT7063."yukoKaishiYMD" <= #{systemDate} ORDER BY DbT7063."serviceShuruiCode" DESC, DbT7063."yukoKaishiYMD" DESC

SELECT DbT7063."yukoKaishiYMD" as "DbT7063_yukoKaishiYMD", DbT7063."yukoShuryoYMD" as "DbT7063_yukoShuryoYMD", DbT7063."jigyoshaName" as "DbT7063_jigyoshaName", DbT7063."kanrishaName" as "DbT7063_kanrishaName", DbT7063."serviceShuruiCode" as "DbT7063_serviceShuruiCode" FROM (SELECT dbT7063Service."yukoKaishiYMD", dbT7063Service."yukoShuryoYMD", dbT7063Service."jigyoshaName", dbT7063Service."kanrishaName", dbT7063Service."serviceShuruiCode", row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY dbT7063Service."jigyoshaNo", dbT7063Service."serviceShuruiCode" ORDER BY dbT7063Service."yukoKaishiYMD" DESC) AS rrkno FROM rgdb."DbT7063KaigoJigyoshaShiteiService" AS dbT7063Service WHERE dbT7063Service."yukoKaishiYMD" <= #{systemDate}) AS DbT7063 WHERE DbT7063.rrkno = 1
